effects.display_string: Set: Your damaging spells have a chance to hit a Jackpot!, launching a Shattering Star at 3 nearby enemies at 100% effectiveness. Casting Dragonrage always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Casting Shattering Star or hitting a Jackpot! increases the damage of your next empower spell by 25%, stacking up to 2 times.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 194,284 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

name: The Jastor Diamond

spells.description: Equip: Take Credit for your allies' deeds up to once every 12 sec, gaining 81 of their highest secondary stat up to 10 times until shortly after leaving combat. You have a 10% chance to get caught in the act, transferring all accumulated Credit to your ally for 15 sec instead.

description: I'm not gonna give you a detailed receipt of all the businesses I took over, started, sold, or destroyed. I won: that's all. I won everything I wanted.

spells.description: Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 8,150 to 9,961 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 302 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to empower the Eye and grant you 421 Intellect up to 20 times, decaying rapidly upon leaving combat. While fully empowered, the Eye instead deals 112,577 Fire damage to enemies or heals allies for 168,875.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Cloak of Stifling Brimstone

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to call down a Voltaic Stormrook, inflicting 409,431 Nature damage split between nearby enemies and granting 2,660 Haste, further increased for each enemy struck.
